meta_title: MRO Supply Chain Management: The 2026 Guide to Maintenance Logistics
meta_description: Master the "Internal Supply Chain." Learn how to optimize MRO inventory, automate spare parts procurement, and reduce lead times using Factory AI.
title: Supply Chain Management in Maintenance: Optimizing the "Internal" Logistics of MRO

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Supply Chain Management in Maintenance: Optimizing the "Internal" Logistics of MRO

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern yet active manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance professionals (men and women) are wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One engineer is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) while looking at a large industrial motor. In the background, automated conveyors and storage racks filled with spare parts are visible, symbolizing the connection between machinery and supply chain. The lighting is professional industrial lighting, with a slight blue hue to suggest technology integration. No text or overlays in the image.
